alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 8:40PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL LAFAYETTE... NORTHWESTERN ST. MARTIN AND EASTERN ST. LANDRY PARISHES THROUGH 915 PM CST... At 840 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grand Coteau, or near Leonville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opelousas, Carencro, Krotz Springs, Leonville, Arnaudville, Melville, Sunset, Port Barre, Washington, Grand Coteau, Cankton, Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge, and Lawtell. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 5 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin
